library.component.drag.start.requested.notes: Published when library component drag is requested; includes component id and position

library:component:drop.notes: Published when library component is dropped on canvas; triggers canvas component creation

library:container:drop.notes: Published when library component is dropped on a container; inserts child at index

description: Library component plugin topics - source of truth from domains/renderx-web/runtime/library-component/json-sequences/
